title: The benefits code: valuation of benefits: special rules for certain benefits

details.body:
## Part 3 ITEPA 2003 The general rule in [EIM21102](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21102.htm) for valuing benefits does not apply to certain items. The legislation therefore contains special rules for them. The benefits for which there are special rules and the relevant legislation and instructions are shown in the following table (all references to ITEPA 2003).
**Benefit to which special rules apply**  **Relevant legislation ** **Relevant instructions**
Asset placed at the disposal of director or employee, except in an excluded employment (except a motor car) Section 205 [EIM21630](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21630.htm) onwards
Asset transferred to a director or employee, except in an excluded employment, at undervalue Sections 62 and Section 206 [EIM21640](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21640.htm) onwards
Facilities such as heating, lighting, cleaning, repairs etc connected with job-related living accommodation Section 315 [EIM21720](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21720.htm) onwards
Income tax not deducted from directors' earnings Section 223 [EIM21790](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21790.htm) onwards
Loans provided interest-free or at an interest rate less than the official rate Part 3 Chapter 7 [EIM26101](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM26101.htm) onwards
Loans waived or written off Section 188(2) and (3) [EIM21740](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21740.htm) onwards
Motors cars available for private use Part 3 Chapter 6 [EIM23000](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM23000.htm) onwards
Motor car fuel provided for private motoring in a provided car Section 149 [EIM25500](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM25500.htm) onwards
Scholarships awarded to members of the family of a director or an employee, except in an excluded employment Section 212 [EIM30000](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM30000.htm) onwards
Shares acquired at an undervalue by reason of the employment Part 3 Chapter 8 Share Schemes Manual
Vans available for private use Section 154 [EIM22700](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22700.htm) onwards
